# Introduction

[Click here](https://github.com/julianstanley/julianstanley.com/raw/master/content/resources/Goldwater_2017.pdf)
to view my project proposal for the 2017 Barry Goldwater award.

I proposed a systematic set of assays to uncover the role of TGF-B signaling in the regulation of aging
in *Caenorhabditis elegans*.
